alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Lake; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 3:33PM CST until February 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Large battering waves 10 to 14 feet. Waves of this magnitude will result in renewed shoreline erosion, lakeshore flooding, and dangerous conditions near the lakefront. * WHERE...Lake IL, Northern Cook, Central Cook and Southern Cook Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Flooding of property along the lakeshore including parts of the Chicago bike path are likely, with flooding of some low lying roads possible. Freezing spray could also lead to ice accumulation on surfaces near the lake.
info.instruction: Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to protect property from rising water levels.
